reviews: Kids were able make the product themselves using the given instructions. It was simple and fun.
Got the papercraft kit and pebble kit as return gifts for my son's bday. The kids loved them a lot.

My kid really liked the aerodynamic activity. It made her feel that she is a scientist. She was super elated with the aero dynamic activity and she said ..when she made it ..it gave her a sense of accomplishment but when the model flew ..she felt proud as something babe made was actually working ...she says she can't explain that feeling in words ðŸ™ˆ

I would like to thank your team for a fantastic activity for the children during lockdown. Your womnderful handling of the session and patience with ensuring that every child understands and communicates is truly appreciated. Thanks a lot
Thank you for the amazingly creative learning time. I'm super excited with propellers
The clay to make the key chain was very nice and my daughter really enjoyed it a lot... thanks a lot... and please let me know if you have some art and craft things like this.
Got the pebble kit and balsa kit for my niece and nephew. They found the kit to be very interesting and they had fun and learn a lot.
Very Simple. I really like it. My son is enjoying. balancing the center of gravity with clay is a fantastic idea.
I didn't help my kid in doing it. She did it all by herself
My kid loved the pebble kit purchased from you. Thank a lot.
My son liked the kit very much and assembled the product on his own and denied my help. He was very excited and the packaging is very attractive.
My son liked the kit very much and assembled the product on his own and denied my help. He was very excited and the packaging is very attractive.
